Item.name: Rift Engine
Item.description: Creates rift material. Use a Rift Material Transfomer to turn the material into usable resources.

Item.name: Rift Material Transformer
Item.description: Turns rift material into any resource you can imagine! Utilizes the energy released when converting rift material into resources to power itself.

Item.name: Rift Material
Item.description: A crystal used for advanced applications, usually transmutation into matter.
